name: For Your Life
description:
Explore a Forest to find the 10 hidden Paper Cranes. Sounds simple, until you realise that the Forest is plagued by evil beings, who will do anything to stop you in your tracks, especially The Slider, who will be running towards you the entire time...

*THIS GAME CONTAINS PSYCHOLOGICAL HORROR AND LOTS OF JUMPSCARES. NOT FOR THE FAINT HEARTED*

New maps will be added every month.
